001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003/**
004 * Pokemon POJO.
005 * 
006 * @author fv
007 */
008public final class Pokemon extends PokemonMetadata {
009
010        /** Combat Point of the pokemon. **/
011        private final int cp;
012
013        /** HP of the pokemon. **/
014        private final int hp;
015
016        /** Required dust for upgrading this pokemon. **/
017        private final int dust;
018
019        /** Required candy for upgrading this pokemon. **/
020        private final int candy;
021
022        /** IV perfection percentage. **/
023        private final double iv;
024        
025        /**
026         * Default constructor.
027         * 
028         * @param index Pokemon index.
029         * @param name Pokemon name.
030         * @param attack Attack level.
031         * @param defense Defense level.
032         * @param stamina Stamina level.
033         * @param cp Pokemon cp.
034         * @param hp Pokemon hp.
035         * @param dust Required dust for upgrading this pokemon.
036         * @param candy Required candy for upgrading this pokemon.
037         * @param iv IV perfection percentage.
038         */
039        public Pokemon(
040                        final int index,
041                        final String name,
042                        final int attack,
043                        final int defense,
044                        final int stamina,
045                        final int cp,
046                        final int hp,
047                        final int dust,
048                        final int candy,
049                        final double iv) {
050                super(index, name, attack, defense, stamina);
051                this.cp = cp;
052                this.hp = hp;
053                this.dust = dust;
054                this.candy = candy;
055                this.iv = iv;
056        }
057
058        /** Combat Point getter getter. **/
059        public int getCp() {
060                return cp;
061        }
062        
063        /** HP getter. **/
064        public int getHp() {
065                return hp;
066        }
067
068        /** Dust getter. **/
069        public int getDust() {
070                return dust;
071        }
072
073        /** Candy getter. **/
074        public int getCandy() {
075                return candy;
076        }
077        
078        /** IV getter. **/
079        public double getIv() {
080                return iv;
081        }
082        
083}
